com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps
Class PollingRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.SynchronousRequest
      com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.SynchronousMultiTargetRequest
          com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.PollingRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.aloqa.trax.shared.io.Serialisable, com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.AppIdIntegrator, com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.MultiTarget, com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.Request
public class PollingRequest
extends com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.SynchronousMultiTargetRequest

Use this synchronous request with the TraXAPI_SAP_App-interface in order to poll the current positions of one or more target users. The result received from TraXAPI_SAP_App.synchRequest(String, SynchronousRequest) will be of type PollingResponse.
Note that Invoking TraXAPI_SAP_App.synchRequest(String, SynchronousRequest) with this request will normally lead to a data transmission to the Aloqa server and will require an open connection. However, if there is only one user to poll whose id equals the one specified with TraXClient.TraXClient(String, String), then the invocation is handled completely locally, without incurring network traffic.

          Creates a new PollingRequest with the given set of mobile terminals (MTs) to poll.
